snippet.title: Penguin Piste Hard Level
snippet.description:
A short clip of me failing to complete my own game!

__Link here:__ https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=uk.co.gidge.skiingpenguin

Penguin Piste is a free to play, fast paced, skiing action platformer with genuinely challenging levels.

I've never done this before, so I'd appreciate anybody giving my game a quick play and letting me know any feedback!

It's just under 25mb, levels only take about 2 minutes so it's very fast to try and I'd appreciate any downloads!

I started learning game development at the start of April, and set myself a 2 month goal during lockdown. It's now the end of May, and although there's a lot more that I want to do, I'm sticking to my goal and releasing it today.
